attributes.action: To call for a General Election in light of the EU Referendum result.
attributes.additional_details:
Supporting petition/ 

HannahBarhamBrown@doctors.org.uk

attributes.background: The British public deserves the opportunity to choose who will lead us through the consequences of the Brexit vote. A General Election must be called. It would be profoundly undemocratic in these circumstances to allow the Conservative party alone to choose the next Prime Minister.
